name: ALPHA (itch) (Fenrir123)
description:
This is just a prototype and also my first game ,i am still learning how to code so fill free to give me some suggestions on it This game is a platformer shooter with  dashing , double jump and other cool stuff keys
  • up or  space to jump and if clicked in mid air activates double jump
  • tab or left mouse  button to shoot
  • aim using mouse
  • right mouse button to dash
  • A key or right key to move right
  • D key or left key to move left
  • x to change camera zoom
  • esc to exit
  • r to restart
currently only one type of enemy Thanks for trying my game and reading this kindergarten level writing
